fields.description: This is a dripping, dank cave.
fields.name: Boulder Cave

fields.description: You're outside. It is a nice day.
fields.name: Courtyard

fields.description: This is a uneven, rocky path lined with trees. Branches are dangling so you duck to avoid being poked in the face.
fields.name: Winding Path

fields.description: Dense foliage and trees make it difficult to look around.
fields.name: Forest

fields.transition_message: You open the door and step out into sunlight.

fields.description: A path continues up a steep hill.

fields.transition_message: You open the door and step into a warmly lit room.
fields.description: The front door to a nearby building is closed.

fields.transition_message: Slowly, you descend into the cave.
fields.description: You see the opening to a dark cave.

fields.transition_message: You jump up through the swirling portal and are unceremoneously dumped back on the ground a few seconds later.
fields.description: A weird portal is hovering in midair.

fields.transition_message: You jump off the hill excitedly and run into the pool of sunlight and warmth.
fields.description: Behind you at the bottom of the hill is a courtyard.

fields.transition_message: As you walk down the path, the air grows cooler and the ground grows spongier.
fields.description: Another path forks to the right.

fields.transition_message: you struggle through the leaves, which almost seem to clutch at you. You break free and sprint up the path.
fields.description: A shaft of sunlight shines plaintively through the brush.

fields.inroom_description: You see a rock. It glows as you approach it.
fields.name: Artifact
Quest for the Artifact
fields.description: You've heard stories about an ancient artifact which grants special powers. Find it for bonus loot.
